data.title: Covid-19 Analytics
data.subtitle: ReactJS
data.description: This Web application was developed with collaboration with Indian Statistical Institute - Kolkata. It was aimed to make the process of unlocking of Covid affected areas more predictable for decision makers.

data.title: Personal Portfolio
data.subtitle: ReactJS
data.description: Personal portfolio application made in ReactJs.

data.title: CoolLockScreen
data.subtitle: UWP [C#, XAML]
data.description: Windows 10 application for creating collections of wallpapers which periodically update the lockscreen and desktop background. It also features an integrated image editor with various free to use tools.

data.title: SonicXBeat
data.subtitle: Windows Phone [C#, XAML]
data.description: Windows Phone (8.1/10) music player application. Top features included integrated lyrics, custom themes and integrated with the windows live tiles .
